description: A defensive Rokushiki technique that hardens the user's body to become as hard as iron, allowing them to withstand powerful attacks. The user tenses their muscles to an extreme degree, making their body nearly impenetrable.

keyMoments.title: Blueno Demonstrates Tekkai
keyMoments.description: Blueno uses Tekkai to completely block Tilestone's massive mallet attack, hardening his body to withstand the impact without taking any damage.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of a Rokushiki technique in the anime, showcasing the superhuman abilities of CP9 agents.

strengths: Can be used by all CP9 members with training
weaknesses: User cannot move while using Tekkai
Leaves user vulnerable to attacks from unexpected angles
Can be overcome by sufficiently powerful attacks

description: A speed-based Rokushiki technique that allows the user to move at extremely high speeds by kicking off the ground at least ten times in the blink of an eye. To observers, it appears as though the user has teleported.

keyMoments.title: Blueno Uses Soru
keyMoments.description: Blueno demonstrates the Rokushiki technique Soru, moving at incredible speed that appears almost like teleportation to normal observers.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Soru, one of the six Rokushiki techniques that becomes a signature CP9 ability throughout the arc.

strengths: Difficult for opponents to track or predict
Can be used to evade attacks or close distance quickly
weaknesses: Can be anticipated by skilled opponents
Limited by the user's own physical limits

description: A kicking-based Rokushiki technique where the user kicks at very high speeds and strength, creating a sharp compressed air blade projectile that can slice through objects. The technique focuses on kicking strength and allows for ranged attacks.

keyMoments.title: Kaku Demonstrates Rankyaku
keyMoments.description: Kaku demonstrates the Rokushiki technique Rankyaku by kicking with tremendous speed and strength, creating a sharp compressed air blade.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Rankyaku showcases the diverse arsenal of abilities CP9 possesses and becomes one of Kaku's signature techniques.

strengths: Does not require physical contact with opponent
Can be used in combination with other techniques
weaknesses: Can be dodged by fast opponents
Power depends on user's kicking strength
